snippet.title: The Sacred Acorn: Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259760/The_Sacred_Acorn/

Cute meets chaos in The Sacred Acorn when a small squirrel with ancient powers embarks on an epic adventure to save the world from impending doom. Master ancient powers and battle brutal bosses in this deceptively cute single player top-down adventure for PC with metroidvania and souls-like inspirations, stunning hand drawn art, and a bespoke, atmospheric soundtrack from the studio A Few Dragons. Coming July 17th 2024! 
__________________________________________________________________________________________________

~ STAY UPDATED ~
